thread.title: BRIEF-Bullish Bonds & Holdings To Raise Authorised Share Capital Of Co By 130 Mln Rupees‍​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Bullish Bonds & Holdings To Raise Authorised Share Capital Of Co By 130 Mln Rupees‍​

organizations.name: raise authorised share capital of co

text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Bullish Bonds & Holdings Ltd:
* WILL ISSUE 10.3 MILLION SHARES FOR CONSIDERATION OTHER THAN CASH ON ACQUISITION OF SHARES OF EAST WEST FREIGHT CARRIERS ‍​
* DECIDED TO ISSUE 2.6 MILLION SHARES TO INVESTORS‍​ * DECIDED TO RAISE AUTHORISED SHARE CAPITAL OF CO BY 130 MILLION RUPEES Source text: bit.ly/2BfRgQz Further company coverage:
